Hello,

Sorry I didn't answer your question, but out of the three act=
ive players already here i'm the newest. However I believe that none of the=
 factions have a base at the ark, but it is watched. So there should be lit=
tle to no changes from the 'tune you remember, save for the battle going on=
 now, and the ensuing  battle scars.

However there is a black ball of dark=
ness around the ark and it is difficult to get clear readings from within i=
t. Strangely there is an undefined minion (Unicronian) signature coming fro=
m it. 

I hope this helps, and perhaps Robo or Arily could fill in anything=
 I forgot or got wrong.

Preston
